events.description: The Hang Seng fell 325 points to finish at 26,560 on Friday, reversing gains from the prior three sessions.
Wall Street experienced its third straight sell-off on Thursday, impacting global sentiment.
Upcoming release of China's consumer price index data for January.
Holiday beginning February 15 leading to anticipated thinner market activity.
Meituan agreed to acquire the China unit of Dingdong (Cayman) for USD 717 million.

facts.fact_text: The Hang Seng fell 325 points, or 1.2%, to finish at 26,560 on Friday.

evidences.evidence_text: The Hang Seng fell 325 points, or 1.2%, to finish at 26,560 on Friday

facts.fact_text: The Hang Seng index lost 3.0% for the week.

evidences.evidence_text: For the week, the index lost 3.0%, its first decline in four weeks

facts.fact_text: Meituan agreed to acquire Dingdong Fresh for USD 717 million.

evidences.evidence_text: Meituan slipped 2.2% after agreeing to acquire Dingdong Fresh, the China unit of Dingdong (Cayman), for USD 717 million

facts.fact_text: Knowledge Atlas Tech fell 6.1%, AIA Group fell 5.2%, and Minimax Group fell 4.9%.

evidences.evidence_text: Knowledge Atlas Tech (-6.1%), AIA Group (-5.2%), and Minimax Group (-4.9%) were among today’s biggest losers.

claims.claim_text: New AI models could erode software firm profits.

evidences.evidence_text: highlighting mounting concerns that new AI models could erode software firm profits

claims.claim_text: Recent gold price volatility is a potential driver of consumer inflation.

evidences.evidence_text: recent gold price volatility seen as a potential driver of consumer inflation

claims.claim_text: Market activity will be thinner ahead of the Lunar New Year.
claims.author: traders

evidences.evidence_text: traders anticipate thinner activity in Hong Kong and mainland markets ahead of the Lunar New Year holiday

claims.claim_text: Meituan faces challenges in core commerce and resource-heavy overseas expansion.

evidences.evidence_text: though challenges in its core commerce and resource-heavy overseas expansion remain

evidence.evidence_text: Sentiment was pressured by Wall Street’s third straight sell-off Thursday
recent gold price volatility seen as a potential driver of consumer inflation
traders anticipate thinner activity in Hong Kong and mainland markets ahead of the Lunar New Year holiday
concerns that new AI models could erode software firm profits
